references.paper_title: Representational similarity analysis - connecting the branches of systems neuroscience
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of Representational Similarity Matrices (RSMs), a core methodology of the current work.

references.paper_title: Similarity of neural network representations revisited
references.reason: This paper provided a key method (CKA) used to compare representational similarity matrices, which is revisited and improved upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduced CLIP, a model used in the experiments for feature extraction and embedding.
This paper introduced SAM, another model used in the experiments for feature extraction and embedding.

references.paper_title: DINOv2: Learning robust visual features without supervision
references.reason: This paper introduced DINOv2, yet another model used in the experiments for feature extraction and embedding.
